name: Ketta
appearance: Neat bun under a brimmed cap, spectacles on a brass chain, ink-stained fingers and a tongue slightly discolored from too many Oathwell tastings.
character: Diligent and fair, with a skeptic’s eyebrow and a clerk’s quiet courage.
talents: spots mismatched salt-grain in forged inks
builds memory palaces of cargo weights
swims in heavy robes without panic
dreams: Break the forged-pass ring undermining Brinelaw
One day take the High Bailiff’s bench
secrets: Forged a single pass years ago to save a debtor family from prison
Quietly colludes with Irio to flag suspect shipments without alerting smugglers
Her missing father was a bailiff last seen near the Salt Widow’s Lighthouse
